catalog_info.title: Readings in Tibetan Narrative Literature
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Tibetan 101a, Tibetan 101b, Tibetan 102a, and Tibetan 102b, or the equivalent.
catalog_info.description: In this class we will read Nyang ral's (d.1192)  so-called Zangs gling ma biography of the Indo-Tibetan thaumaturge Padmasambhava (ca. 800) and use several  recently discovered recensions through which this work has been transmitted. Special attention will be paid on interpreting the different readings that the manuscript dossier elicits.

person.display_name: Leonard W. J. van der Kuijp
